problems.problem: Social media websites use cheap AI softwares for moderating aggressive arguments, which often lead to deleting political opinions.
problems.solution: The corporation decided to upgrade to a more expensive AI that priroitizes keeping political opinions.
problems.solution2: The government mandated an upgrade to a more expensive AI that priroitizes keeping  political opinions.
problems.benefitText: Around [number]% more opportunities to share politicial opinions for [affected]
problems.costText: €[number] higher yearly fees for using the platform

problems.problem: Social media websites need to moderate calls for violence from extremist groups between users, which often leads to deleting political opinions.
problems.solution: The corporation decided to upgrade to an AI that priroitizes keeping political opinions over removing calls for violence.
problems.solution2: The government mandated an upgrade to an AI that priroitizes keeping political opinions over removing calls for violence.
problems.benefitText: Around [number]% more opportunities to share political opinions for [affected]

problems.problem: Social media websites need to moderate aggressive arguments between users, which often lead to deleting political opinions.
problems.solution: The corporation decided to upgrade to an AI that priroitizes keeping political opinions over removing aggressive arguments
problems.solution2: The government mandated an upgrade to an AI that priroitizes keeping political opinions over removing aggressive arguments.
problems.benefitText: Around [number]% more opportunities to share political opinions for [affected]

problems.problem: News outlets often try to publish the most engaging stories, which leads to some news getting left out.
problems.solution: The corporation decided to upgrade to an AI system that prioritises informativeness in publishing.
problems.solution2: The government mandated an upgrade to an AI system that prioritises informativeness in publishing.
problems.benefitText: Around [number]% more access to investigative reporting from [affected] media outlets.
problems.costText: [number]% less engaging news, worse jounral experience

problems.costText: [number]% less likelihood of police catching criminals

problems.problem: Courts are using an AI system that is biased in certain types of cases that lead to unfair sentencing.
problems.solution: The corporation that owns the AI, upgraded it to prioritze decreasing biases in sentencing over speed.
problems.solution2: The government mandated the upgrade of the AI system that prioritizes decreasing biases in sentencing over speed.
problems.benefitText: Around [number]% more chance to get a fair sentencing in cases that usually affect [affected]
